website_summaries.verdict: Natural, vegan, and cruelty-free option for a great price.
pros: Large amount compared to other popular brands at 1.23 oz
A perfect choice for those who are sensitive to artificial coloring or flavorings
Naturally sweet and moisturizing from coconut, jojoba, avocado, and almond oils
cons: Thick formula and small granules may not be what some users want

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend and the price is great
customer_reviews.text: Wow! My lips are always dry and it’s drives my boyfriend crazy that I peel the dry skin. My lips feel new! They are soft, took the dead skin off and look hydrated. Definitely recommend and the price is great!
customer_reviews.author: Elvia Villa

customer_reviews.title: My lips are smoother, softer, and it smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on a whim, but no regrets! It smells delicious! The smell reminds me of toasted almonds and almond cookies! I love how you can lick it off (no weird chemicals added), although I just wash it off. But the little bit I have tasted tastes like an almond cookie! I used the lip scrub before bed, and I could immediate tell the difference. My lips are smoother and softer, and my chapstick lasts much longer on my lips. I made my husband use it once, and his lips were also much smoother and super soft after one use!
customer_reviews.author: Cowie

customer_reviews.title: Dried out my lips
customer_reviews.text: Was really disappointed because this product had decent reviews and was really looking forward to using it. I used it twice and my lips are now super dry, to the point where it’s painful and my lips have cracked so I have red lines going up and down on my bottom lip. I’m putting treatment on them now. Disappointed I wasted my money
customer_reviews.author: MeXay

customer_reviews.title: A little luxury
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Yes, i have had dry lips and just scooped a little coconut oil and some sugar from my kitchen and scrubbed my lips, and yes that also works. However, this is an absolute luxury and the price is good. It smells/tastes wonderful and i found myself saying a number of "ooohs" and "aaaahs" as i used it the first time. I would buy it again and would also purchase as a gift because i think most people would enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: Buddingtwigs

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! Also taste delicious.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I'm prone to chapped lips and I have anxiety so I find myself chewing on my lips every once in awhile. After a week of using this twice a day, I have stopped wanting to bite on my lips because they're SO soft and my lipstick glides on so much easier and looks way better.
customer_reviews.author: MsMelLovett

customer_reviews.title: ❤❤❤
customer_reviews.text: ❤❤❤❤ I only use once a day and my lips are so soft!!!!❤❤❤❤ This winter has had some really harsh wind and bitter cold. So chapped lips are on a all time high. This scrub has taking care of that. Bonus, it doesn't leave that coating of chapstick oil on your lips.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lip scrub
customer_reviews.text: Makes my lips sooooo soft. Also plumps them if you scrub up and down instead of side to side. Add a plumping gloss, or serum and you're good to go. Gave it 4 stars, because it would have been nice to have a flavor. Maybe a month flavor. This is comparable to Lush's edible scrub.
customer_reviews.author: Addie

customer_reviews.title: Saved my smokers lips!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because I was a heavy smoker and my lips became very dark. After doing some research on natural ways of regaining lighter lips and reviewing the ingredients, I figured trying it to help aid in the recovery. I used the product 2 times a day along with lip exfoliating brush and virgin coconut oil and have already seen the dramatic difference in lightening of my lips. The product helped remove the dead skin that smoking has caused. I'm very pleased and will continue to use this product to help lighten my lips!
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: BEST LIP SCRUB OUT THERE!
customer_reviews.text: The best lip scrub. You only need a tiny bit each time. My lips have been chapped and peeling and after one scrub, it takes away the dead layers and moisturizes. I use it 3or so times a week to keep my lips fresh. Just bought some for a friend for her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Tenney

customer_reviews.title: Read this before you waste your money...
customer_reviews.text: It's literally just sugar and oil, it does absolutely nothing so don't waste your money. I literally used it the second it arrived just to be disappointed, if you feel like you still want to buy it after reading the reviews like I did. Try making it yourself first, all it is is cane sugar, coconut oil, almond oil, avocado oil, olive oil, jojoba oil to name a few. You can get all those oils at Sally's beauty supply...
customer_reviews.author: Nakita

customer_reviews.title: Lips love it!
customer_reviews.text: No complaints about this scrub. It works well, smells great, tastes great (yeah, I licked my lips), leaves lips shiny, healthy, plumpy & smooooth. It's similar to a diy coconut oil & sugar scrub but WAY better. Heads up, use a clean & dry q-tip to scoop out a tiny bit for your lips. Your supply will not only last longer, you will avoid yucking up your scrub for future uses. Aaaand if you have a little dry patch on your face, dab a lil there...this stuff works on that too...even though they don't advertise that (its a beauty hack thing).
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Too dry and crumbly to be effective
customer_reviews.text: The texture of this lip scrub makes it difficult to use and Somewhat ineffective. It’s gritty and crumbly, which makes it difficult to apply. I’ve tried an applicator as well as my finger and the stuff crumbles everywhere, making in challenging to massage the stuff onto my lips. After every use I have to clean up wasted clumps of the product — I’d say I waste half an application’s worth during each use. A product needs a creamier texture in order to be an effective lip exfoliator.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Jones

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients are most important always!
customer_reviews.text: For starters, those who don’t know ingredients are always listed from most contained to least in the description. So i went to Paula choice (their website has a whole list of ingredients and rankings! Poor, Average, good, best) So i searched all of these up and the rankings were either good or best so i’m very pleased to hear that. The container was also completely filled to the top which rarely happens. This lip scrub is great because it’s a mild/soft exfoliation and you don’t want something that is too abrasive because that could cause further damage to the lips :)
customer_reviews.author: kelsey

customer_reviews.title: A-mazing
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait to do a review. My lips tend to dry if I don't drink enough water; even if its just a day. Yesterday my lips were peeling out of nowhere, so last night I used the product and scrubbed it in, left it on, took a shower and when washing my face I removed it. After I used an overnight lip balm(O'keeffe's lip repair night treatment). Woke this morning nice and smooth again. The jar is small,but packed in and you only need a very small amount for each treatment
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Tastes gross and I could make this at home way cheaper
customer_reviews.text: This moisturized well. However, it tasted like pure raw coconut oil. If they would have put a mint flavor spearmint or peppermint it would be great but I got a little bit of it in my mouth and it made me physically sick the taste. It does not smell or taste like coconut and I know they that it wouldn't but I thought that for sure they would have a carrier oil or something in there that's natural to make it not taste so noxious. I sent it back. I can make my own I've got coconut oil I've got sugar and I've got peppermint oil. Well I paid as much for something you can make yourself?
customer_reviews.author: Bama Girl

customer_reviews.title: Very small and pricey but I'd have to say its worth it for its benifits
customer_reviews.text: Love this lip scrub was deffinantly a lot smaller than I imagined it's a really tiny jar but it works wonders it will keep your lips soft and free of dead skin doesn't taste bad either so no need to worry if you get it in your mouth has a kind of sand texture to it allowing it to scrub off dead skin pretty pricey for its size but it's a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: #1 Honest reviewer :)

customer_reviews.title: It worked fine
customer_reviews.text: So it did make my lips softer, but I got two pimples right at the edge of my lips the next day! 😡 I rather have dry lips than acne around them. Sigh.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: I feel like a sucker for buying into this! This is something I could have definitely made myself with products I already have. I thought that it would be different or better quality than a homemade recipe, and nah, I was wrong. I used this to exfoliate on multiple occasions and followed the directions and I have seen zero change to my dry, chapped lips. I am not understanding the review hype around this at all.
customer_reviews.author: RobinTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and gentle
customer_reviews.text: I like a lip scrub I can lick off. This one is all natural and has a gentle exfoliation. Perfect for dry lips. If your lips are really dry you can try their Matcha and Piña Colada flavors that are scrubier. This one is tasty and coconutty like West Indian style macaroons.
customer_reviews.author: Jerilyn Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good and my lips feel great.
customer_reviews.text: Never tried a lip scrub before so I wasn't sure of what to expect. This lip scrub is excellent though. My lips dry out really quickly, but since I started using this, they feel much softer and I don't need to glob on tons of lip balm anymore. Very pleased with it, and it tastes delicious too!
customer_reviews.author: kokorocloud

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! Was having issues with my lips being super dry and chapped, even using brands like Eos and Burt's. My friend suggested using this lip scrub because she had the same issue from complications with her thyroid. Omg! It really works y'all! I used it about 8am at my desk at work, my lips were still smooth and moisturized at 6PM when I got home! I'm shook! This stuff is amazing! Wish the flavor was a little stronger, though; it pretty much just tastes/smells like sugar.
customer_reviews.author: AJay_89

customer_reviews.title: It's all it's cracked up to be
customer_reviews.text: I've been seeing this on Buzzfeed and all over the internet, and I didn't think there was any way this could be worth the hype. It is. It is just a sugar scrub, but the granules seem finer than what's in my kitchen, and I really, really like the fact that there aren't any artificial fragrances, which often irritate my skin and sinuses. It is definitely moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Michayla

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Yes it works. My lips get chapped sometimes, and this product is my go-to whenever it does. If my lips are really chapped, using the product didn’t get my lips 100% smooth (I know it’s not magic, so I didn’t expect it to do that), but it did improve my lips. It’s worth the buy in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Ada

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t really work
customer_reviews.text: I thought that this product was intended to scrub the dead skin off of your lips. It did not scrub any off at all whatsoever. My lips were the same as before I used the scrub, so this was disappointing. Making your own scrub with water and sugar is more effective in getting the dead skin off your lips. Also, it did little in moisturizing my lips. The smell was alright, mild with a hint of coconut. Overall, I was really hoping that this product would work. At least it smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing lip scrub
customer_reviews.text: Amazing lip scrub. It's scent is mainly coconut oil. It's very light. It's not too harsh and a little pea size amount goes a long way. I have chronically dry, flaky, chapped lips & this has been a great, non irritating solution. It leaves an oily residue once you rinse it, but that's a plus because it's still moisturizing after you've finished using it. Definately still follow with a lip balm for added moisturizing effect. It's smaller than I thought I would be. Great packaging; it was sealed, in a box, & everything.
customer_reviews.author: Kayladd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have never wrote a review for any product. But the stuff work. I notice that my lips are becoming brighter. My lips is dark dues to wearing Matt lipstick and never allowing my lips to stay bare. Because I was embarrassed by how dark it gotten over the years. My only concern with the product is that it small but it worth the price. I love it and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for making this!!!! This helps so beautifully
customer_reviews.text: I love it! This works wonderfully!!! I have sensitive skin and VERY DRY LIPS and I have to apply lip balm a lot in a day but this thing helps so much. This makes my lip very soft and moisturized and removes dead skin on my lips and just scrub some seconds and it just works beautifully. I’m grateful. I didn’t even use this once a week. Maybe one a few weeks. I am thankful for this product. Marvelous!
customer_reviews.author: Yoshino Ushijima

customer_reviews.title: Scrub has an expiration date of one month after opening
customer_reviews.text: I do like this scrub! It's a little messy but I've noticed my lips are softer after just a couple uses. The downside is that it has an expiration date of only one month after opening, and I'm not sure it's worth purchasing on a monthly basis. I understand it's all natural and that's what you'll get with a product like this, but it's a little too pricey for me.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: I don’t recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: This makes my lips feel smooth but only right after I wash it out. After a minute or so they start to feel super dry. But I was like okay maybe if I just use some chap stick it will help but noooo after the second time of using this my lips became more chapped then ever. And my lips only got better after I stopped using it. So yeah I don’t recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: LEGENDARY

customer_reviews.title: ... I the only one that thinks this stuff smells like onions? I hate it
customer_reviews.text: Am I the only one that thinks this stuff smells like onions? I hate it! It’s making me feel BLEH! I mean for the purpose of scrubbing and exfoliating it seemed to work good. My lips were soft after but onion is my least favorite smell ever and that’s all I can think of for some reason!
customer_reviews.author: ckb

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy over and over
customer_reviews.text: At last I finally stepped into the world of lip scrubs, and I'm glad I made the decision to buy this one. I usually make my own scrubs but was worried about making my own lip one. Thank goodness I found this. The jar is a perfect size to travel with. And my lips have been extremely chapped due to this Houston weather. No matter how much water I drink or chapstick I use, my lips are always cracked. First try and I felt like I was living a dream my lips are completely moisturized. I shall be back lol
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Nix

customer_reviews.title: Made my lips dry
customer_reviews.text: Used it when my lips weren’t dry but had a bit of peeling from sleeping in chap stick overnight. Within 15 minutes of finishing my face routine the edges of my lips started feeling and looking dry and cracked. Thought it might be a fluke since cooler weather is upon us. Tried it 3 more times with the same result each time, several days between each use. Expensive for small amount as well.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: scabby dry lips be gone!
customer_reviews.text: I have constantly dry lips that are scabby dry flaky and prevent me from wearing anything other than chapstick and even then sometimes.... but this is a god send - it finally got rid of my dry lips. i mean, part of it is drinking more water so i'm doing more of that too, but this has definitely help boost the effects and with a good day of hydrating and this scrub - I can wear lipstick!! *thumbs up* definitely going to rebuy this.
customer_reviews.author: cristina st germain

customer_reviews.title: Plumps, de-gunks, and adds moisture
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizing lip scrub REALLY does clean off dry skin Andy the day’s “gunk”. But it also invigorates, made my lips redder and plumper. From the friction? From the ingredients? I dint know. They feel soft and that ever-present dry feeling is gone. Just not sure how long the effects last.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Now my lips are super soft!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my scrub. It did exactly what it is supposed to, exfoliate my lips. It is unscented, except from the natural coconut from the oil. It has no artificial flavorings, just the natural sugar. I highly recommend this. No frills. Excellent product. The packaging is super cute too. A bit larger than I was expecting, so bonus 😁
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works & it tastes yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I LOVE this stuff. Fortunately I do read caution so therefore I am not eating this stuff! There is nothing bad about this product to me. It tastes super good so if some gets in my mouth I don't reach for water to rinse it out. It makes my lps nice and soft & shiny. My lipstick stays on better too after using this stuff. Highly recommend. Did I mention it tastes like sugared coconut cream? Yummy
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant smell, not harsh on your lips!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product. Although I use lipstick or gloss daily, I always have dry peeling lips. The first time I used it, my lips were plump and cleansed and moisturized! Thank you! I plan on buying several for stocking stuffers this year!
customer_reviews.author: TamiLynne

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!!! It was my first order and within three days I could tell the difference. I was interested in buying vegan coconut scrub due to the discoloration of my lips due to cigarettes. My lips are back pink and softer with the combination of the ingredients within this product. I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Works well for mild exfoliating
customer_reviews.text: Works well for mild exfoliating. For larger jobs a small soft brush would be helpful. I am using a soft new toothbrush. (New unused ultra soft toothbrush. A little expensive but has worked great.). It would be nice to have one provided with the lip scrub.
customer_reviews.author: Kimi-chan

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister. Her birthday was May 1st. I expected so much more out of this product. My sister let me use some and honestly for the price it’s bad. I could have diy this and it would have came out the same. For the price I also expected it to be a little bigger. She has really chapped lips and this kind of helped but not really much of a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi

customer_reviews.title: Make a sugar scrub at home...do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Not at all impressed.. especially for about $10. If this product had been free I may give it a 2-star but it would still only be sugar in a tiny container. Yes it smells and tastes good...yes, it's vegan. It's 2 cents worth of sugar. It did nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Hainstock

customer_reviews.title: Gentle yet effective!
customer_reviews.text: I love this scrub! It's gentle, has a dry texture, and helps me prep my lips and my clients' lips before liquid lipsticks. It isn't moisturizing by nature, but my lips don't feel stripped after using it, either! I recommend applying a balm afterwards to really nourish your lips. I love this scrub.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Not what I hoped
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely dry cracked lips and I was looking for something to help moisturize and help them heal. While this product helped my lips to feel moisturized almost immediately, it only lasted about an hour before I was back to that dry feeling again. This product may help some people, but it didn’t help me.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Another favorite!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm on an exfoliating run right now...heck, forever! Get this for your lips please!! My lips are soft, smooth and plump. My lipstick rolls on like butter! Daughters have taken this from me. Now I have to purchase more! Get this...you need this too!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: i've tried several exfoliators and this the best one by far. I liked it's coconut flavor and smell its is very hidratating and removes all and every dry flaky pieces on your lips. i will only improve putting a little bit more oil in it but that is my preferrence!, It is really good as it is
customer_reviews.author: Mariel

customer_reviews.title: Super Kissable Lips
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!!! I just received it yesterday and i’ve already used it thrice. My boyfriend has also tried it and loves it too!! Of course, you could probably DIY this product at home, but I think this is a really great option if you don’t want to make the concoction yourself. Great Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Shanice Turner

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it yesterday, but I tried it last night, and this works great! Softens lips and takes off all the dead skin! Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Smooth lips
customer_reviews.text: my lips are really bad at skin peeling. When using this i washed my face and actually rubbed in thr scrub to try and help get rid of dead skin. It keeps my lips nice and smooth for about a week. I was surpised bc carmex, vaseline, or blistex do not work for dead skin purposes
customer_reviews.author: Mia A

customer_reviews.title: Good - not a fan of the « paste » texture though
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product for over a month now and here are my feedback : - great for exfoliating: it really does a great job on that end - a bit too oily afterwards, I would have preferred something more granulated to work with because it’s like a paste - if you’re a big fan of coconut you’ll love it but I wish the scent wasn’t as tough. Good product overall but not worth all the praise
customer_reviews.author: Yasmine

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: Smells sweet and delicious! I love all of the natural ingredients in this scrub. It also helps me buff my lips and get rid of dead skin so that I can keep my lips smooth and soft. A definite must in the winter here in Colorado!
customer_reviews.author: Moonlight

customer_reviews.title: Best Lip Scrub
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is fabulous! I was nervous it would have a coconut taste (I hate coconut) but it doesn’t. It mostly just taste like brown sugar. My lips are so soft and feel amazing after exfoliating with this. I use it a few times a week. Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Vee

customer_reviews.title: Works and smells nice.
customer_reviews.text: This lip scrub works! I have very dry skin/lips this time of year. I use this before bed and my lips are more soft and alot less cracked than without using product.
customer_reviews.author: Prlgirl63

customer_reviews.title: Rid of dead skin and dark coloring
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! In just three days of using the product my lips look and feel so much better! I got Rid of dead skin and also feel it has gotten rid of darker coloring that was around my lips. Would definitely recommend buying and use along side with Vaseline.
customer_reviews.author: T. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great smell, extremely useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for my fiancé who tends to have extremely dry lips even though he uses Chapstick all the time. I have noticed barely any flakes of dry skin on his lips since he started using this on a regular basis. The smell of this product is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Roof

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use LipScuff, a product in a lipstick like tube that was wonderful. They quit making it and I just walked around with chapped lips for a long time. Decided to try this product and I love it. It's sweet so no problems when some get in your mouth. The scrubbing part is effective and when I'm done, my lips actually feel a bit plumped. I miss the tube, but my lips are doing great!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Lynn Collins

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Only ok. Wish this had more grit, but I guess that I understand that is why they call it gental exfoliation. Also, not a big fan of a scrub in a pot. By the time the scrub was 1/2 gone it was hard to get out of the pot and it was getting under my nails when I tried to use. The flavor was nice. Overall, this just wasn’t the scrub for me but I could see it working for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: A regular shopper

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: I looked at almost every review prior to purchasing this lip scrub. It appears to be a good size, but it's really like 1.2 ounces. It's very grainy (which I appreciate) and a little does go a long way. I don't think I'll buy again though for $10.
customer_reviews.author: Denea Nriaka

customer_reviews.title: A little crumbly, but overall good product
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says it does. There is no nasty taste and the smoothness afterwards is nice. I have super dry lip so this isn't a cure all, but if I use it once a day it keeps them in check. My only problem is that even though I use the recommended amount it tends to crumble. Most of it ends up on my lips, but when I first used it I had trouble keeping it from falling off my finger when rubbing it in. Overall, good product and it lasts along time.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Love this scrub!
customer_reviews.text: Loving this lip scrub so far! Softer than other scrubs I've tried but works so nicely. Has a nice soft consistency and isnt oily like others I've tried. The price is good for the amount you get because just a little goes a long way! Would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot. I was worried because the jar is so tiny, but you use so little at a time, so it really lasts. The coconut tastes great, and it really has helped my chapped lips this dry winter.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I don't love the smell but it doesn't bother me so I don't mind it. It works really well on my chapped lips, I used to always be applying lip balm but this product has drastically cut down my use of balms because it moisturizes and gets rid of dead skin pretty well. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gen

customer_reviews.title: Great exfoliator
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. Gets me through Minnesota winters. And who doesn't like soft, smooth lips?
customer_reviews.author: K. Garvey

customer_reviews.title: Made my lips so soft!
customer_reviews.text: I naturally have very chapped lips all year round and I’m constantly applying chapstick and this product is amazing. The first use there were no more dry rough spots and my lips were fully smooth and soft again and it’s been a long time since my lips have been this soft. Amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Vegan Lip Scrub 🌱
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lip scrub I’ve ever used. The smell is nice, it’s just gritty enough without being rough and my lips feel amazing afterwards. It takes a very small amount so I think this tub should last a long time. When it’s out I will definitely buy again. I also love that it’s vegan💕.
customer_reviews.author: V. Edmonds

customer_reviews.title: Lips like Water
customer_reviews.text: I’m a guy first off lol but I’ve been using this every morning then applying my old faithful Burt bees or carmex (whichever is accessible). It doesn’t take much to do what it says it can do and I have volume in my lips. It leaves my lips smoother than smooth like smoothhhhh, ALL day after just using it for two days. Highly recommend it if you’re lips are easily chapped or darkened from smoking.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Really helps dry lips!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you apply scrub over a sink as some of it may fall off your finger when applying. Do not need to use too much at a time. About a half finger tip worth. The scrub does a good job of removing dead skin and makes your lips feel a lot smoother. Not a strong smell. Good to use once a week or more if you have a lot of dry skin. Lips feel smooth right away and plumper. A must have in the winter!
customer_reviews.author: Chris P

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Such a nice lip scrub! I just received it today and just finished using it and wow! It smelled and tasted pretty amazing. I love how it's preservative free and made out of natural ingredients. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who wants their lips looks looking and feeling amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works amazing
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t wait to get this in the mail my lips gets super chapped so easily and I always pick at the skins that comes off and this really helped me and it did not make me bleed and they left my lips super soft!!! And it smells so good definitely recommending this to all my family and friends!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Keep searching!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent scrub. It works within second. Hands down the best. Update 6/10/2020 This item really just cover up the dry skin on lips. I thought that it was effective however, it doesn't work. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MsRobinson

customer_reviews.title: Nice exfoliating lip scrub
customer_reviews.text: It is a gentle scrubber. I use the lip exfoliators I purchased from amazon to put it on my lips. That way I dont touch the rest of the product with my hands. After the exfoliation your lips gets a natural redness from increased blood circulation.
customer_reviews.author: emi

customer_reviews.title: happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is a natural product. It has a nice grit to it and when used with a lip scrubbing brush it does an amazing job! I use this at the beginning of my makeup routine and don't rinse it off when finished. By the time I complete my makeup, the scrub has melted into the lips, leaving them exfoliated and moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: a hudson

customer_reviews.title: Does nothing
customer_reviews.text: Not moisturizing, does not exfoliate well, flakes off lips immensely while trying to rub over lips making it ineffective. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Kerry R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. First time getting this item shipped, i was delivered aveeno moisturizer instead! Just got my replacement Item in the mail. It is clumpy and melted on arrival. Contacted support and told me to reach out to amazon instead. Buy a different lip scrub. It is not exfoliating and smells funky.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Works fast, and leaves my lips feeling smooth.
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with extreme chapped lips that peel constantly. I've tried other products that only make my lips greasy, and don't really do anything for my lips. This scrub worked on the first try. Not only did it help with my extra skin on my lips but it moisturized my lips. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: lupeAs

customer_reviews.title: Make a diy scrub at home.
customer_reviews.text: This product is nice but you could make the same scrub with sugar and an oil you prefer. A little goes a long way. I don’t think it’s worth the price and the box was torn apart, too. Save your money and make a diy scrub instead.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time!
customer_reviews.text: This product was very disappointing!!! The smell and taste were great but didn’t work At all. It would just clump up in a ball and just fall off my lip. Doesn’t glide on smoothly. It just brakes apart and crumbles and falls off lip. Reviews we’re misleading. Would not recommend this at all. Does not work!
customer_reviews.author: haley auth

customer_reviews.title: Great lip scrub
customer_reviews.text: I like this lip scrub! It does a good job at exfoliating. I use it 3-4 times a week and my Lips are smooth not feathered. My lips do look plumper after I use this- but I wouldn’t consider this a lip plumper
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Covered in Ants!!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t able to enjoy this product because when I received my scrub it was infested with ants!! I got bit a few times and I had to make sure I killed the ones who made their way to my kitchen countertop. Talk about disappointment. Now I’m paranoid about the ants that may have escaped and could possible infest my house.
customer_reviews.author: CML

customer_reviews.title: difficult to apply
customer_reviews.text: found it tedious to apply - to include in my regimen. have to apply it - and massage it on my lips - and wait a few minutes. then wash it off. but -- the flavor and scent are fine. very light. not strong/ overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Enforcer2410

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I'm so impressed. I have tried lip scrubs before and been disappointed, but this one is excellent and delivers as promised. I use it once a week and it keeps my lips perfect for applying gloss and lipsticks five+ days a week. The scent is also super yum. I will purchase it again!
customer_reviews.author: RGR

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended no consistency
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would love this, but very disappointed. It’s so dry that u can’t even use it to scrub your lips there is no consistency to this. This is one of the worst lip scrubs i have used. Does not scrub any dry skin off or moisturize lips at all. Would no lt recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen R Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip scrub. I will be buying more. It really works for my very dry lips. It has been 2 weeks and I am amazed at the difference in my lip skin, so soft. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sciencia Paul

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully and highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works really great I will wash my face and then put this on my lips and scrub them and rinse it off and my lips look great, it taste pretty good and then your lips look plump and beautiful and sexy and they’re clean really clean it helps get rid of all that dead skin that you really didn’t know you had on there
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn McHenry

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Good
customer_reviews.text: Great for chapped or damaged lips. Thought the claims were a little fantastic but this is a must have item for climates where chapped lips are common or low humidity areas where dry lips can use some regular exfoliation.
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Love this lip scrub!
customer_reviews.text: I do enjoy using the scrub with with the brush (separate item)to better scrub the lips. The texture of the scrub is perfect for removing dead skin on the lips. Lastly, the price is more than fair for the results!
customer_reviews.author: moneteson

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, but not what I had hoped for
customer_reviews.text: Well it tastes good, and smells good... but thats about it. The product doesn't exfoliate my lips as I had hoped and I still have dry skin on them. It does add some softness to my lips which is good, but thats not what I was hoping to get out of it. I thought the jar size was decent and there was quite a lot of product inside.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Cute product
customer_reviews.text: Using it once a month as a scrub. After using it really makes the lips smooth. Lipstick looks better after using this. It's a cute but not mandatory product. Thanks to seller and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Deniz Sa.

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my lips are so soft and smooth
customer_reviews.text: My lips get so dry and flakey and this product was a life-changer for me. After using this, my lips are so soft and smooth. Don't think I can ever live without this
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Soft lips
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical that this product would do what it claims. It does more! My lips are very dry and chapped during the winter. I’ve only used this product a couple times and my lips feel Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Fletch B

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble with dry chapped lips in the winter. Sometimes really bad. Using this stuff really helps and makes and amazing difference. Well worth the price and I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: LLP

customer_reviews.title: Lip scrub
customer_reviews.text: I think this has to be the best lip scrub I have ever used. Most other lip scrubs one are too oily or the sugar is too hard on the lips this one is soft and gentle. I am able to use this one twice and day with no reaction. It removes dry skin from the lips and leaves you feeling and looking good.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Murchison

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Love it makes my lips smell great and makes them soft notices the difference ASAP the container is small but a little goes a long way so this will last a while
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Makes my lips feel sexy .. worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell not to heavy and even if you get some in your mouth its okay because It taste Yummy ! Makes me feel like they plump my lips and make them super soft and smell and look Great .. will deff be buying again when I run out !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this little jar
customer_reviews.text: I use this a lot! At least once a week, my lips were raised (LOL) very high maintenance, and I NEVER go without lip balm, I feel naked without, so my lips are always smooth and moisturized, so this little jar its amazing and serves its purpose, also smells good!!
customer_reviews.author: ili

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what it's supposed to do. It smells great, feels great, and removed all of my dead skin and soften my lips in the first use! The only conflict I had was that the bottle was smaller than I expected. But still no worries, a little goes a long way so I know it will last long.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. It looks like the jar is bigger in advertising. But it’s very small . And not going to work for the idea I had the product itself is ok . I would just have liked a bigger jar
customer_reviews.author: Alise m.

customer_reviews.title: I’d rather use e.l.f. exfoliater
customer_reviews.text: Not terrible so I’m giving 2 stars. I don’t know what it is about the formula, but it doesn’t exfoliate very well; also when I apply it to my lips, it seems to just fall off in chunks and I end up having to apply more. I’ve actually gotten better results with the cheapie e.l.f. exfoliater stick.
customer_reviews.author: Bebe Hale

customer_reviews.title: Great smell and taste
customer_reviews.text: Once you put this on you will wonder how you ever got along without this! I use it with an exfoliating brush and it leaves my lips so smooth and soft, but not only that, it makes putting your lipstick look so much better. It smells great and tastes good on your lips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Works as a gentle lip scrub. I find lip scrubs aren’t fully effective for me but for the price and amount it’s worth a try if you like gentle scrubs.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Only lip scrub you will need!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd time buying this product! I have tried many others and they don't even come close to this! I love the everything about this product. A little goes a long way. I will keep buying! Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Ellyn

product_meta.title: All Natural, Vegan Coconut Lip Scrub - Gentle Exfoliation, Lip Moisturizer & Conditioner, 1.23oz
feature_bullets: 100% natural lip exfoliator for dry lips. A lip scrub made with real coconuts.
Handcrafted. Vegan & cruelty free. Unscented and fragrance free lip polish.
Absolutely no parabens, artificial preservatives or synthetic chemicals.
Naturally moisturizes with avocado oil, jojoba oil and sweet almond oil for a lip repair.
Provides a gentle natural exfoliation with coconut and sugar before using a lip mask overnight

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
